name: Data Encrypted with zip and gpg symmetric

steps.name: Check dependency 1/1
steps.description: gpg and zip are required to run the test.

data.command: if [ ! -x "$(command -v gpg)" ] || [ ! -x "$(command -v zip)" ]; then exit 1; fi;

steps.name: Resolve dependency 1/1
steps.description: gpg and zip are required to run the test.

data.command: (which pkg && pkg install -y gnupg zip)||(which yum && yum -y install epel-release zip gpg)||(which apt-get && apt-get install -y zip gpg)

steps.name: Re-check dependency 1/1
steps.description: gpg and zip are required to run the test.

data.command: if [ ! -x "$(command -v gpg)" ] || [ ! -x "$(command -v zip)" ]; then exit 1; fi;

input_arguments.name: test_file
input_arguments.description: Temp file used to store encrypted data.
